shortdesc.ph: Sets the audio format for the callback.

section.p: You need to register the callback when calling the method. After successful registration, the SDK triggers the callback, and you can set the audio format in the return value of this callback.
section.note: The SDK calculates the sampling interval based on the you set in the return value, and triggers the callback accordingly. The formula for calculating the sampling interval is: Sampling interval (seconds) = samplePerCall / (sampleRate × channel). Make sure the sampling interval is ≥ 0.01 seconds.

section.title: Return Values
section.p: When the method call succeeds, returns an audio parameter for playback. See .
